basics.name: Vicente Robles, PhD
basics.title: Scientist & Engineer
basics.summary: Experienced engineer with expertise in design, data analysis, modeling, and prototyping.

work.name: Institute for Advanced Study, Princeton University
work.summary: Teaching at Palmer Physical Laboratory (now 302 Frist Campus Center). While not a professor at Princeton, I associated with the physics professors and continued to give lectures on campus.

awards.title: FORD Predoctoral Felowship
awards.awarder: National Academies of Science, Engineering, and Medicine
awards.summary: Ford Foundation Fellowships promote diversity in academia, supporting individuals with superior academic achievement. Aimed at those committed to research at the college or university level, the program seeks scholars who demonstrate promise for future achievement.
